.. include:: /../common/unsafe.rst

***************
RSA
***************

.. py:module:: toy_crypto.rsa
    :synopsis: RSA utilities

    Imported with::

        from toy_crypto import rsa

The RSA algorithm is probably the public key algorithm that is most widely
known by the general public.
There are lots of toy implementations of it.
Unfortunately not all of them are clearly labeled as toys
or understood as such by their developers.
